name: somnambulist/domain
description: Provides a collection of entities, helpers and base implementations for creating domain objects.

suggest.giggsey/libphonenumber-for-php: To validate phone numbers / convert to E164 from a local format
suggest.doctrine/orm: To use the Doctrine components and have an entity mapper
suggest.pagerfanta/pagerfanta: For Pagination of Doctrine results and other data
suggest.symfony/http-foundation: For request id injection into event context
suggest.symfony/messenger: (A)Sync Bus implementation for Symfony needed for query/command/event bus messenger implementations
suggest.symfony/security-core: For injecting the user information into event context
suggest.symfony/serializer: Send domain events as JSON strings via messenger
